title: Update: Is Her Daughter Wrong For Not Wanting To Invite Her Friend's Twin To Her Sleepover?
description:
Her nine-year-old daughter is planning to have her first ever sleepover. She wants to invite her best friend, but not her best friend's twin even though she is friends with them both.
Is this something that can turn into a problem later on down the road? We discuss.
